item.title: About
item.description:
ğŸ‘¤ Personal Information

  • Full Name: HoÃ ng DÆ°Æ¡ng

ğŸ‘‹ Overview

I am an Intern Software Engineer with a passion for Backend development and DevOps. I am eager to apply my university knowledge to real-world development challenges and contribute effectively to assigned projects. With a strong interest in backend technologies, my long-term goal is to leverage this foundation to transition into a DevOps Engineer or Systems Architect role in the future.

I have accumulated proven full-stack web development experience with successful project delivery, modern workflows, and production-ready deployments.

ğŸ’¼ Work Experience

1. Freelance Web Developer ğŸš€

Position: Full-stack Developer | March 2025 - Present | Remote

  • Built and deployed full-stack web projects using Spring Boot, NestJS and Next.js, React
  • Handled client requirements, pricing, and deployment on server environments
  • Successfully delivered more than 3 client projects and improved deployment efficiency through Docker and Nginx

2. Intern Web Developer ğŸ¯

Position: Full-stack Developer Intern | October 2024 - February 2025 | Company Internship

  • Built web interfaces and RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Next.js within the Scrum workflow and microservices architecture
  • Contributed to system analysis, CI/CD optimization, infrastructure deployment using IaC, and team collaboration with Git/GitHub

ğŸ› ï¸ Notable Projects

DevOps Blog ğŸ“š

Role: Full-stack Developer & Content Creator | February 2025 - Present

  • Built a static site blog using modern static site generator focused on DevOps, Docker optimization, and cloud infrastructure topics
  • Published technical articles covering Docker optimization techniques, Nginx configuration, CI/CD workflows, and best practices for containerized applications
  • Deployed and maintained production site with custom domain, automated build pipelines, and content management workflows

ğŸ”— Visit Blog | GitHub Repository

Tourism Digitalization Platform (360Â° Virtual Travel) ğŸŒ

Role: Full-stack Developer - Graduation Thesis | May 2025 - August 2025

  • Built a microservices-based tourism platform (Spring Boot, Node.js, Python/Flask, Next.js) for managing interactive 360Â° virtual destinations
  • Designed a Docker Compose infrastructure with Kong Gateway, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, and separate client/admin Next.js frontends
  • Implemented secure API routing (JWT, rate limiting, logging) and media pipelines for uploading, extracting, and serving 360Â° assets

ğŸ”— GitHub Repository

Online Testing Platform (IRT-CAT) ğŸ“

Role: Full-stack Developer - Team of 5 | April 2025 - July 2025

  • Built an adaptive testing platform using the 3PL-IRT model and CAT, including backend modules for students/exams/question banks with per-item difficulty parameters and an automated 3PL-IRT scoring pipeline

ğŸ”— Live Demo

Document Conversion & OCR System ğŸ“„

Role: DevOps Support / Full-stack Developer - Team of 6 | October 2024 - February 2025

  • Created an OCR-based document processing system (PDF â†’ DOCX, ID extraction) with real-time processing
  • Achieved over 98% text recognition accuracy and reduced processing time by 60% with a microservices architecture
  • Contributed to deployment on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) using an IaC approach with Terraform and CI/CD pipelines via GitHub and Jenkins
  • Collaborated with a teammate to set up container orchestration and production deployment using Helm and Kubernetes

ğŸ¯ Career Goals

I aspire to become a Backend Developer with experience and continue developing into a DevOps Engineer, where I can:

  • Continue learning to enhance my expertise
  • Master cloud technologies and infrastructure as code
  • Build scalable, reliable, and high-performance systems
